February 1 2018 CAS stated that the sanctions against 28 Russian athletes, including Ivan Skobrev, were annulled and their individual results achieved in Sochi 2014 reinstated.","47":null,"48":"Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced in pairs on separate tracks (the inner and outer lanes) on a 400 m oval rink. Skaters switched lanes at every lap in order to skate an equal distance. The Gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race.
